edu.harvard.integer.service.distribution

Interface DistributionServiceInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseServiceInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributionService

    public interface DistributionServiceInterface
extends BaseServiceInterface
    The distribution service is responsible for where all the services and managers are running as well as the state of each of the services, managers and servers in the integer system.

    The distribution service will run on each server so that all services and managers on each server can find a local or remote manager or service.
